scripts.db:push:escrow: ECCO_DB_PATH=.ecco/escrow-service.sqlite bun run ../packages/core/bin/db-push.ts && ECCO_DB_PATH=.ecco/escrow-client.sqlite bun run ../packages/core/bin/db-push.ts && ECCO_DB_PATH=.ecco/escrow-approver.sqlite bun run ../packages/core/bin/db-push.ts
scripts.db:push:swarm: ECCO_DB_PATH=.ecco/swarm-client.sqlite bun run ../packages/core/bin/db-push.ts && ECCO_DB_PATH=.ecco/swarm-worker1.sqlite bun run ../packages/core/bin/db-push.ts && ECCO_DB_PATH=.ecco/swarm-worker2.sqlite bun run ../packages/core/bin/db-push.ts && ECCO_DB_PATH=.ecco/swarm-worker3.sqlite bun run ../packages/core/bin/db-push.ts
